    • Uses of Beat in Grammar_Elements

      Method parameters in Grammar_Elements with type arguments of type Beat 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void WellFormednessAnalyser.verifyGWFR1(java.util.List<Beat> beats)
      Verifies that the GWFR 1 rules is satisfied, which states that 'Any contiguous sequence of pitch-events, drum beats, or the like can constitute a group, and only contiguous sequences can constitute a group.' Ensures that all the groups only span contiguous Beats objects.

      This method employs the time-span reduction and prolongational reduction preference rules in order to generate a list of maps, where each map constitutes one possible set of pitch events within a piece of music.
